sendInviteLink.label: Invite link
sendInviteLink.sent: The invite link has been sent successfully to participant

sendInviteLink.title: Invite by link

testMedia.aProperlyTuned: A properly tuned microphone should put the VU meter in the green center area when speaking.

tour.consultationsHistoryMenuContent: When you decide to close a session, your service user will no longer be able to exchange messages with you. The session information will remain here for 24 hours only before being deleted from the system for security reasons.
tour.endTourDescription: You can change the language or enable SMS notifications in case something happens when you are not connected to this application.
tour.headerProfileMenuContent: Here you can change the language of {{branding}} or enable SMS/WhatsApp notifications in case a service user messages or tries to call when you are not connected to this application.
tour.inviteFormContactInputContent: Fill in the person's information to easily recognize who is waiting for or in an active {{branding}} session. You can send the invitation link via SMS, email, or WhatsApp, depending on rules in your country.
tour.inviteFormSendLinkManuallyContent: If you prefer to share the link with your service user manually or via another means of communication (viber, Telegram etc), check this box. Be careful not to use the link yourself to test it, as the link is usable only once - by the service user.
tour.invitesMenuContent: Here you can see or revoke open invitations and send new invitations to set up {{branding}} sessions with service users or colleagues.
tour.newInviteButtonContent: Click on "invite" to enable a service user to join a {{branding}} session.
tour.openedConsultationsMenuContent: Once you have had an initial session with a service user, you can choose to keep the session open so you can continue  sending messages or have another call over days or weeks. You can view these open sessions here
tour.remotePatientInviteContent: Click on 'Remote Service user' so Service user can join you on this application.
tour.startTourDescription: {{branding}} helps you connect with Service users. This tour will help you understand the concept. You can skip the tour at any time by closing this help.
tour.waitingRoomMenuContent:
Here you see all service users who have opened their invitation link and are currently in the queue waiting for their session. You will be notified with a sound and see them waiting here with a green indicator.
Keep the application open to reduce the risk of missing waiting service users!
